root.message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 17-18-2, translated into en
root.data: 17.18 By 2020, provide increased support for capacity building in developing countries, including least developed countries and small island developing States, with the goal of having much more data available for quality, up-to-date and accurate, disaggregated by income level, sex, age, race, ethnicity, migration status, disability and geographic location, and other country specific characteristics
